author: Videogame_Ninja
text:
It'll be placed beside my gaming PC (3090), Series X and Switch. Getting it for the games to play on it, not to stare at it on the shelf.

However, its aesthetics are a controversial topic. Some love it or hate it, personally I think it's a bit weird looking but still hype for it.

author: Macrophage_Mage
text:
Not to mention the music is being done by Theophany, who in my mind is a god of video game music. He‚Äôs known for his fan-made [Majora‚Äôs Mask OST re-orchestrations](https://youtu.be/cLTnvRoxfPk) which are *out of this fucking world*
(he also did the music for the incredible [*Terrible Fate* Majora‚Äôs Mask short film by Ember Lab](https://youtu.be/vbMQfaG6lo8), which went viral a few years back.) *Kena* will be his breakthrough into the industry proper and I really hope he starts getting the recognition he deserves.
